Closet.Body: You find yourself in a closet room stuck inside the body of a ragdoll. Your memory is iffy...

Choices.Text: Open the door to the hallway

Hallway.Body: There looks to be an open hallway with nothing to explore except for the rooms and open spaces to visit.

Guest Bedroom.Body: There is not much to see in this room except a bed, a table, and a guest bathroom.

Guest Bathroom.Body: There is not much to see in this room except a bed, a table, and a guest bathroom.

Bathtub.Body: You open the curtains to the bathtub. What did you expect to see in here? Just looks like an ordinary bathtub that hasn't been used in ages.

Choices.Text: Back to the center of the bathroom

Cabinet.Body: You open the doors to the cabinet. Something sparkly catches your eye. Looks like a red key labeled 'Key 2'. You keep it in your pocket.

Choices.Text: Back to the center of the bathroom

Stairway.Body: You walked up the stairs. There are 5 choices. Your pick.

Choices.Text: Go into the second Children's Bedroom

Children's Bedroom.Body: Looks like an older kid stayed in this room. You see a bunch of posters related to old basketball players like Magic Johnson and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar. There seems to be a bed, a desk with figurines on it, and a clothes cabinet.

Choices.Text: Take a look at the desk

Children's Bedroom Cabinet.Body: You open the cabinet doors. Looks like ordinary 80's clothes with a lot of dust on them. Wait... something shiny caught your eye. Looks like a blue key that is labeled 'Key 4'. You keep it in your pocket.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Children's Desk.Body: You check the desk. Nothing out of the ordinary sticks out to you. Nnothing to check out I suppose.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Children's Bed.Body: You check the bed. Just appears to be a crummy old bed with a stiff mattress that must have worn out over the years.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Master Bedroom.Body: Looks like the parents of a family stayed in this room. You see 2 paintings that look very vintage. There seems to be a big bed and a big closet.

Master Bed.Body: You check the bed. Just appears to be a crummy old bed with a stiff mattress that must have worn out over the years.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Master Closet.Body: You check the closet. Looks like old clothes that just have a lot of dust on them. You wasted time checking it to be honest...

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Hallway Bathroom.Body: Looks to be a crusty old bathroom. Which one do you want to check: the sink or the toilet? Both look like weird choices in my opinion.

Hallway Bathroom Sink.Body: You check the sink. Yikes. Looks so bad you almost vomited. Then you realized you're a doll.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Hallway Bathroom Toilet.Body: You check the toilet. Surprisingly, it was decently cleaned. Something shiny caught your eye. You go to pick it up. Looks like a green key with 'Key 5' written on it. You keep it in your pocket.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Second Children's Bedroom.Body: Looks like two younger kids stayed in this room. You see a bunch of kids toys laying around the room with a huge bin of just stuffed animals. What do you want to check out?

Choices.Text: Take a look at the desk

Second Children's Bedroom Cabinet.Body: You open the cabinet doors. Looks like old kid clothes. Nothing special to check in here.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Second Children's Bedroom Desk.Body: You check the desk. Ooooooo something shiny caught your eye. Looks like a yellow key with 'Key 3' inscribed on it. You keep it in your pocket.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Second Children's Bedroom Bunk Bed.Body: You check the bunk bed. Looks like a bunch of kids just jumped on it. The mattress is worn out. Nothing else to see here buddy.

Choices.Text: Go back to the center of the room

Hall.Body: You see a sofa, a fancy looking coffee table, and the oldest CRT TV you have ever seen with a Nintendo NES system plugged in. Something shiny caught your eye. Looks like a magenta key with 'Key 1' inscribed on it.

Kitchen.Body: You enter the kitchen and there is a piece of paper just lying on the kitchen counter. Do you want to read it?

Read the paper.Body:
The paper says the following: 
 Days ago, you entered into this house with your friends. A ghoul came along and introduced himself as 'John'. That was not his real name. His name was something ancient. Even I don't remember. But what ended up happening was that your friends ran but you ended up just having a deep conversation with the ghoul. He wanted to give you a piece of candy, but he accidentally gave you a pill that turns you into a doll. Out of fear, he left and just left you to rot in the closet. How about that? At least it looks like you have a way out.

Unlocked.Body: All the keys fit into the many locks on the door. You are finally free. Now that you are free from the encapsulating body of a doll, you decide to enjoy your freedom by going to eat some real candy, hoping it does not turn out to be the pill from earlier.

Locked.Body: The door is locked. Looks like a bunch of keyholes that need to be unlocked...
